definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

to read/to study (a subject)/to attend (a school)/to read aloud/to give (sb) a tongue-lashing (CL:頓|顿[dun4])/to miss (sb)/idea/remembrance/twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿[nian4])
variant of 念[nian4], to read aloud

sentences.english: How precious to me are your thoughts, O God!
sentences.chinese: 神阿，你的意念向我何等宝贵。

sentences.english: This is true connection, when intention runs through all the layers and fibers of our being.
sentences.chinese: 当意念充满全身的各个层系时，便达到了真正的联系。

sentences.english: How many of you believe in psycho-kinesis? Raise my hand.
sentences.chinese: 多少人相信意念驱物的？请把我的手举起来。

sentences.english: In the overflow of ideas and Thailand more healthy and happy to bring more people.
sentences.chinese: 本着溢泰的意念把更多的健康快乐带给更多的人。

sentences.english: "I have perhaps given a false impression of my life, " she said slowly.
sentences.chinese: 我也许给了我生活的一个错误的意念，“她慢慢说。”

sentences.english: Cosmoprof Asia is the definitive venue to find new products and ideas.
sentences.chinese: 亚太区美容展是发掘新产品及意念的最佳平台。

sentences.english: A potential marker of chronic pesticide exposure was found to be associated with suicidal ideation, which supports findings from previous studies.
sentences.chinese: 先前研究的发现证明了长期农药接触与自杀意念相关。

sentences.english: I have kept the shape of the poem, opened out its sense more clearly, and tried - as Lowell rightly insists one must try - to get the tone.
sentences.chinese: 我保留了诗歌的外形，更为清楚地展现出诗的意念。

sentences.english: In fact we are all afraid of pain, just ideas, the more afraid of unhappiness.
sentences.chinese: 其实我们都是怕痛的人，只是意念中，更怕不幸福。

sentences.english: Don't let evil thoughts or doubts make any of you turn from the living God.
sentences.chinese: 不要让邪恶的意念和疑心，使你们离弃了永活的上帝。

sentences.english: Dr. Jean Grey Actually I'm telekinetic. I can move things with my mind.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，我有隔空移物的本事，我能用意念移动东西。

sentences.english: The great difficulty in education is to get experience out of ideas. (Grorge Santayana, Spain-born American philosopher and poet)
sentences.chinese: 教育之艰苦在于从意念中获得经验。

sentences.english: He sees not just images and activities but discerns thoughts and motives.
sentences.chinese: 他不单察看我们的言行举止，更鉴察我们的心思意念。

sentences.english: If you don't want a mind to emerge, then unhinge it from the body.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不想让意念产生，就让它跟肉体分离吧。

sentences.english: When one is insincere, one is selfish and seeks after fame and profit.
sentences.chinese: 意念不诚，也就是有个自私心和名利心。

sentences.english: Suicide ideation refers to the mentation of an attempted suicide and suicide completer at the early stage.
sentences.chinese: 自杀意念是自杀未遂和有自杀死亡者早期的心理活动。

definition: mind/state of mind/attention/(Chinese medicine) psychic constitution
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
main part/torso/the thing in itself/noumenon (object of purely intellectual perception according to Kant)
divine light (around the Buddha)/a halo/a miraculous column of light/(slang) jolly good!
